channel.title: PancakeSwap on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in PancakeSwap on Notes

item.title: TradingView Charts for PancakeSwap Tokens
item.content:
PancakeSwap Cheaper and faster than Uniswap? Discover PancakeSwap, the leading DEX on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) with the best farms in DeFi and a lottery for CAKE.

OHLC Chart with Bitquery GraphQL API

  • Uses TradingView Lightweight Charts library
  • Integrates with Bitquery.io GraphQL API
  • Shows prices (WBNB) for Pancakeswap tokens
  • Plots both candlestick and bar charts
View in new tab

CAKE/WBNB - A sample integration of TradingView Lightweight Chart library with Bitquery GraphQL API to showcase candlestick chart for PancakeSwap Tokens. Uses Parcel as the bundler.

Chart for another Token

By default, plots a chart for PancakeSwap (CAKE) token. Setting ?token=<token_address> URL parameter plots for another token by its address. Below is a sample for UniSwap (UNI) token.

View in new tab

UNI/WBNB - A sample integration of TradingView Lightweight Chart library with Bitquery GraphQL API to showcase candlestick chart for PancakeSwap Tokens. Uses Parcel as the bundler.

Looking for a Developer?

Connect with me on Fiverr.com
